title: #81: No Mud No Lotus With Duncan Trussell
description:
Thank you for tuning into another fun and groovy episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. The boys are joined by the one & only Duncan Trussell to discus the depth of the human soul, gurus taking LSD, chanting, Terence McKenna, mind expansion, fighting the internal nuclear war & the transformative power of love...
Yep we go full woo-woo on this one.
Much love and thanks to Duncan for a wonderful experience.
